meanings.definition: Below the level of human beings in terms of intelligence or development.
meanings.sent1: The infrahuman creature struggled to solve even the simplest puzzles.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the infrahuman species to understand their cognitive abilities.
meanings.sent3: The infrahuman robot kept bumping into walls, much to the amusement of the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her behavior at the party was so infrahuman, it was like watching a toddler trying to navigate a maze.
meanings.sent5: The darkness of the cave felt infrahuman, as if it held secrets beyond human comprehension.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to beings or entities that are less advanced or evolved than humans.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins gave off an infrahuman aura, hinting at a civilization long forgotten.
meanings.sent2: The folklore spoke of infrahuman creatures that lurked in the shadows of the forest.
meanings.sent3: The infrahuman technology of the past seemed almost magical to the modern explorers.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice was so hauntingly infrahuman, it transported listeners to another realm.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted an infrahuman landscape, where strange beings roamed under alien skies.
